name: Abandoned (itch) (Michael Grieshofer)
description:
You explore an abandoned planet and unlock abilities to better platform and fight your way though the two large areas of the game.

- 6 unique abilities
- additional super jumps
- health upgrades
- changing environments with    different colored backgrounds , whether    effects and adapting music
- a final boss
- a large world with lots of secrets    to explore 
- settings ... yeah

the use of a gamepad is recommended

Keyboard Controls: Arrow Keys , WASD , Space , Ctrl

(more detail down below - spoilers)

made for the miz jam 1 game jam

Art assets used:  www.kenney.nl
